entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
